# Release Notes

## 0.3.0 (2020-09-08)

### What's fixed
- Reduced the chunk size so larger fields don't hit Pusher's limit. [#51](https://github.com/statamic/collaboration/pull/51)



## 0.2.0 (2020-08-25)

### What's new
- Support for Statamic 3.2



## 0.1.0 (2020-05-13)

### What's new
- First tagged release
